allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize camera recording to achieve 60fps

- Rewrite MJPEG parser with fixed-size buffer for lower latency
- Remove isolate from camera recorder \(async I/O is sufficient\)
- Skip rate limiting for 60fps mode to capture all frames
- Add 60fps option to settings dropdown
- Change default save FPS from 30 to 60
- Add debug logging for frame rate monitoring
- Fix HttpClient cleanup on reconnect to prevent leaks

Recording now achieves 60fps with avg 16.5ms frame delta.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
